meanings.definition: The state or quality of being flabby.
meanings.sent1: Her arms jiggled with flabbiness as she waved.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the flabbiness in his patient's muscles.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the flabbiness of his own belly.
meanings.sent4: The flabbiness of the balloon made it difficult to tie a knot.
meanings.sent5: The flabbiness of the pudding made it wobble on the plate.

meanings.sent1: She was unhappy with the flabbiness of her skin after losing weight.
meanings.sent2: The old mattress had a noticeable flabbiness to it.
meanings.sent3: The flabbiness of the overcooked pasta made it unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: His argument had a certain flabbiness that made it unconvincing.
meanings.sent5: The flabbiness of the rubber band caused it to snap easily.
